operators

Class XMLwriteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.XMLwriteManager

  • public class XMLwriteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes brand new or modified xml-file. Uses StaX for reading and writing the file.
    Author:
    Antti Kurronen

        private void skipReadingMarkingLayer()
                              throws java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • startWritingProcess

        public boolean startWritingProcess(LayersOfPath layersOfPathIn)
        Starts the writing of given ImageLayer- objects into given XML-file. If file exist, the information is append or overWritten depending of existence of ImageLayers and MarkingLayers in XML-file.
        Parameters:
        layersOfPathIn - LayersOfPath, which contains the XML-file path where from read xml-data and where to save the data.
        Returns:
        Boolean value true if saving was made, false otherwise.

      • writeMarkingLayer

        private boolean writeMarkingLayer(MarkingLayer mLayer)
        Writes all information of MarkingLayer-object to XML-file inside tags.
        Parameters:
        mLayer - MarkingLayer-object, which information is saved to XML-file.
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:

      • writeStreamToFile

        private boolean writeStreamToFile(java.io.File file)
        Writes stream to file. The xml-code is given as ByteArrayOutPutStream and saved to xml-file.
        Parameters:
        file - the File to be saved.
        Returns:
        true, if saving successful
